WRITING.TITLE: LF A fic that has this kind of romance

WRITING.TITLE: In SAO: War of the underworld, why do the American beta testers (the red knights) not bleed, but the people from GGO and ALO who came to help asuna and kirito bleed and get hurt?
WRITING.TEXT: This always bugged me. I don #8217;t know if it #8217;s just another miscalculation or another plot hole that SAO always comes up with. Its said to the people of GGO and ALO that there #8217;s no pain absorber and we see that if they get hit they bleed and get hurt. But when the red knights (the americans) get hit or killed they just dissolve into nothing. It doesn #8217;t seem like they #8217;re in pain or that they bleed.
was it stated in the anime or nah? just another sao lapse of logic?
so the americans feel pain as well when they die it #8217;s just not shown? If they do wouldn #8217;t that discourage them to fight?

WRITING.TITLE: Please Help Me Cheapen My Gaming PC build !!
WRITING.TEXT: #8203; Hi, my birthday is coming up and i want to ask my parents for a gaming pc. I know most gaming PCs are expensive, so i tried to create a cheap build. It rounds up to about 680 USD without shipping or a monitor or a keyboard or a mouse. So, i'm asking help because i'm very new to building a PC. I'm asking help to the experts for cheaper alternatives to my pc parts, that will still do well more likely than not. Here is the build: MOTHERBOARD: ASUS TUF B450M-PRO GAMING (AM4) MOTHERBOARD CPU: AMD RYZEN 5 3500X 6-CORE 6-THREAD 3.6-4.10GHZ 32MB 65W CHASIS: INPLAY METEOR 02 WHITE ATX TG MID TOWER CASE GPU: GIGABYTE GTX 1650 WINDFORCE OC 4GB GDDR6 GV-N1656WF2OC-4GD RAM: GSKILL RIPJAWS V 8GB DUAL DDR4 3200MHZ CL16 F4-3200C16D-8GVKB PSU: CORSAIR CV550 BRONZE 550WATTS 80+ POWER SUPPLY M.2 SSD: ADATA XPG SX6000 LITE M.2 NVME 128GB (ASX6000LNP-128GT-C) HDD: WESTERN DIGITAL WD BLUE 1TB 64MB HARD DRIVE WD10EZEX https://preview.redd.it/ymj3h4dd51u51.png?width=750 amp;format=png amp;auto=webp amp;s=450952250d4ab9f92af6a9abb03a14ea99be0ba6 These are the parts available from where i live and i would rather you not change the AMD RYZEN 5 because i still want a good gaming pc. Honestly, i'm not looking for a pc that will run 140 FPS +. A gaming PC that will run games smoothly. A PC that isn't slow. A PC that can run most games at 110 FPS below would be great. I'm sorry if what im asking for isn't realistic, but i thank all the people that try and help me out.

Honestly, i was hoping to run Valorant, CSGO, Fortnite. Games my friends play so i could play with them. My friends told me that valorant and cs is an easy game to run (idk if its true). I was hoping to run WZ as well, but i know that games heavy and hard to run. I #8217;m generally looking to run online multiplayer games. I would also like to play brand new games on this PC even if its at 60 FPS.
i honestly just want to be able to run any game with few problems

I'm sorry if what im asking for isn't realistic, but i thank all the people that try and help me out.
